about_the_game:
Game Dev Arcade is a collection of basic arcade games from a variety of genres ranging from top down shooters to platformers. They all feature individual leaderboards and Steam Achievements.

Mars Madness - OUT NOW


You are dropped on Mars with one objective - to kill all aliens! In this top down shooter, run across the Mars landscape eliminating all threats. How long can you survive??

Monstrous Maze - OUT NOW


You have been taken down to the Ghoul's basement to be served for dinner. Can you escape the maze and return home? Level up your evasion skills as you continue to escape.

Crystal Corridors - OUT NOW


A platformer where you control a Marble and try to collect all of the crystals before making it to the end of the level! Don't move too fast, or you may just fall off the edge.

Learn Game Dev!!

These games were developed by Valthazier from Bulwark Creative. They were made to help show how simple video games are created, and there are many videos about the development of these games on Bulwark Creative's social media profiles. Full source code of the games can also be downloaded to view in the Unreal Engine 5.0 Editor.

Credits

Many game ideas were created by GameDev.tv and most assets used are courtesy of Epic Game's Unreal Engine store.

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3-6100 or AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 660 or AMD Radeon HD 7870
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 250 MB available space

short_description: Game Dev Arcade is a collection of indie arcade games developed by Bulwark Creative. The source code will be available so you can see how they were developed! Play the games yourself, and then check out all the nitty gritty details that go in to making simple video games.
